name: Magnetic Parkour
description:
Help Brian Bayamon Fury clear impossible obstacles with great lengths by unleashing the magnetic powers that dwell within! You'll need to use cunning reflexes and quick wits to quickly traverse levels and take down the bad dudes that get in Brian's way!
